WorkItem.Description: From the reports that I've seen it looks like the effect from this trinket scales with spell power. I don't think any other trinket effect behaves in this way, so we'll probably need to add a new stat for specifically this case.

Comments.Message: Well all of the random trinkets from DS act this way. Vial of shadows and Cunning of the Cruel Both act this way but with Attack power.
Sorry I meant Vial of Shadows and Bone-Link Fetish
Representation for spell power and attack power modified special effects was added, models need to add support to modify the actual damage in computations.

The way it is handled is there are two new parameters on special effects, SpellPowerScaling and AttackPowerScaling. Wherever you used effect.Stats.ShadowDamage for example replace with (effect.Stats.ShadowDamage + effect.SpellPowerScaling * characterStats.SpellPower).
